topic.title: Testing annonymous torrent download : Tribler
topic.body:
Tribler is a torrent client which has introduced tor like anonymity feature while downloading torrent. Still the project is under testing. It also supports live streaming torrent videos.
https://www.tribler.org/
http://lifetrix.net/science-technology/download-anonymously-through-torrent/

2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body: there is no way to completely stop criminals. In this, Monetary economy they will continue to exist. If you dont want people to become criminals change the system...if you cant change it get used to it : )
